languages.text: "Кухонные слуги здесь, конечно, не чета прислуживающим в Великом зале Фенриса, но гостеприимством и щедростью хозяева сей ладьи не обделены".
"The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."
languages.original_text: "Кухонные слуги здесь, конечно, не чета прислуживающим в Великом зале Фенриса, но гостеприимством и щедростью хозяева сей ладьи не обделены".

traits.locale_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Aunque los sirvientes de las cocinas no están a la altura del Gran Salón de Fenris, nadie dirá que los amos de este drekkar carecen de hospitalidad y generosidad».
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque los sirvientes de las cocinas no están a la altura del Gran Salón de Fenris, nadie dirá que los amos de este drekkar carecen de hospitalidad y generosidad».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这里厨房的仆人，自然比不上芬里斯大殿里的厨师，但这艘撞角长船的主人的好客与慷慨众人尽知。”
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: “这里厨房的仆人，自然比不上芬里斯大殿里的厨师，但这艘撞角长船的主人的好客与慷慨众人尽知。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ここの厨房の使用人たちは、フェンリスの大広間で奉仕する使用人には確かに及ばないが、このドレッカールのマスターの、もてなしの気持ちや寛大さが見える」
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: 「ここの厨房の使用人たちは、フェンリスの大広間で奉仕する使用人には確かに及ばないが、このドレッカールのマスターの、もてなしの気持ちや寛大さが見える」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Les domestiques qui travaillent dans ces cuisines n'arrivent sans doute pas à la cheville de ceux qui servent dans la grand-salle de Fenris, mais les maîtres de ce drekkar font honneur aux lois de l'hospitalité et du partage. »
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: « Les domestiques qui travaillent dans ces cuisines n'arrivent sans doute pas à la cheville de ceux qui servent dans la grand-salle de Fenris, mais les maîtres de ce drekkar font honneur aux lois de l'hospitalité et du partage. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Die Küchendiener hier sind denen in der Großen Halle auf Fenris gewiss nicht gewachsen, doch den Meister dieses Drekkars mangelt es nicht an Gastfreundschaft und Großzügigkeit."
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: "Die Küchendiener hier sind denen in der Großen Halle auf Fenris gewiss nicht gewachsen, doch den Meister dieses Drekkars mangelt es nicht an Gastfreundschaft und Großzügigkeit."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Buradaki mutfak hizmetkârları, Fenris'teki Büyük Salon'da hizmet edenlerle yarışamaz bile. Bu drekkarın efendileri ise misafirperverlik ve cömertlik açısından bize denktir."
languages.original_text: "The kitchen servants here are certainly no match for those serving in the Great Hall on Fenris, but the masters of this drekkar are not lacking in hospitality or generosity."

traits.locale_text: "Buradaki mutfak hizmetkârları Fenris'teki Büyük Salon'da hizmet edenlerle yarışamaz bile ama bu drekkarın efendilerinin, misafirperverlik ve cömertlik açısından hiç eksiği yok."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
